casebody.data:
STATE v. BAILEY. No. COA04-1147. North Carolina Court of Appeals. Filed April 5, 2005. Certification Date April 25, 2005. Appeal from Forsyth (01CRS23270, 01CRS55971, 01CRS56418, 01CRS56420, 01CRS56422, 01CRS56423, 01CRS56425).

Case reported without published opinion. Affirmed; remanded for correction of judgment.
